/usr/bin/c++   -O2 -g -DNDEBUG    CMakeFiles/chapter05.dir/main.cpp.o CMakeFiles/chapter05.dir/sceneblur.cpp.o CMakeFiles/chapter05.dir/scenedeferred.cpp.o CMakeFiles/chapter05.dir/sceneedge.cpp.o CMakeFiles/chapter05.dir/scenegamma.cpp.o CMakeFiles/chapter05.dir/scenemsaa.cpp.o CMakeFiles/chapter05.dir/scenetonemap.cpp.o CMakeFiles/chapter05.dir/scenehdrbloom.cpp.o CMakeFiles/chapter05.dir/sceneoit.cpp.o  -o chapter05 -rdynamic ../ingredients/libingredients.a /usr/local/lib/libglfw3.a -lGL -lpthread -lXrandr -lXxf86vm -lXi -lrt
